person.persName: Martha Lydia Johnson Payne (Daughter of George Washington Johnson)

body.p: Daughter of Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson and Ann Eliza Viley. Married Judge George Viley Payne. Mother of Anne (Payne) Coffman and William Johnson Payne. Obituary states that she was "prominent in church and social circles."

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Martha Lydia Johnson Payne (1845-1896), Find A Grave Memorial # 99037338, Georgetown Cemetery, Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=99037338 (accessed 12 Aug 2017).
